importantArticles.headline: T-Mobile US T-Mobile US  posted better-than-expected results on Thursday, but investors appeared to zero in on slowing growth in the company’s main wireless division. Analysts surveyed by FactSet were expecting the wireless provider to report earnings of $2.47 a share on revenue of $20.6 billion.

importantArticles.headline: Shares of Calgary-based energy company Enbridge (NYSE: ENB) are up roughly 6% year to date while the S&P 500 has sunk into a correction. importantArticles.headline: Stocks that pay a dividend aren't doing well these days as high interest rates make for enticing alternatives, but that can present an attractive opportunity to load up on them, as many are offering attractive payouts.  Three stocks that can help generate a ton of revenue for your portfolio today are Verizon Communications (NYSE: VZ), Enbridge (NYSE: ENB), and T. Rowe Price Group (NASDAQ: TROW).  Verizon's stock has struggled over the past five years, falling more than 12%.

importantArticles.headline: The acting head of the Federal Aviation Administration said on  Thursday that members of Elon Musk's DOGE government reform team did not make the agency's decision to test Starlink terminals.  Acting FAA Administrator Chris Rocheleau also said at a U.S. Senate hearing that no Starlink terminals have been plugged into the air traffic control system and that no DOGE employees are involved in the decision-making process around the deployment of additional terminals.
importantArticles.title: DOGE team is not involved in FAA decision on Starlink terminals, acting chief says
